description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. An action hack n slash with up to 7 playable classes!  Fight through dungeons, collect gold and upgrade your heroes!  Alternatively fend off waves of monsters in an arena gamemode filled with powerups, hordes of dungeon dwelling beasts, upgrades and more!
description.short: An action hack n slash with up to 7 playable classes!  Fight through dungeons, collect gold and upgrade your heroes!  Alternatively fend off waves of monsters in an arena gamemode filled with powerups, hordes of dungeon dwelling beasts, upgrades and more!
